description:
In the wake of Epic Games’ victory against Google last December, where a jury ruled that the Google Play app store and Google Play Billing constitute illegal monopolies, the tech giant has revealed the potential costs of implementing court-ordered changes to Android. Google estimates that integrating third-party app stores within its Play Store would cost... Read more »

The post Google: Third-party stores in Play Store would cost over $61M appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Google: Third-party stores in Play Store would cost over $61M
